item.title: 13 Major Side Effects of Acai Berries
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: We’re all aware of the acai berry’s numerous health benefits. However, very few people are aware of the acai berry’s adverse effects. Yes, there are some negative consequences associated with this South American natural berry. But, before we go into the adverse effects, let’s first define what an acai berry is. What is Acai Berry?… Read More »13 Major Side Effects of Acai Berries

item.title: 11 Reasons To Eat Watermelon During Pregnancy
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Pregnancy is a difficult stage in a woman’s life. However, eating a well-balanced diet rich in fruits promotes a healthy pregnancy and alleviates other symptoms such as morning sickness. Eating watermelon during pregnancy is gaining popularity. This delightful fruit is safe for pregnant women to eat because it is high in nutrients. Learn more about… Read More »11 Reasons To Eat Watermelon During Pregnancy

item.title: The Health Benefits of Baobab
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Baobab is fast becoming a health food trend and is considered a superfood from Africa’s “tree of life.” Baobab is one of the only fruits in the world that dries on the branch of the tree. The fruit bakes in the blistering hot sun for six months and the prickly green furry shell then turns… Read More »The Health Benefits of Baobab

item.title: 22 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of Black Raisins
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Black raisin is a popular variety of dried grapes known for its sugary taste and juicy flavor. They are made by drying out black Corinth seedless grapes under the sun or in a dehydrator. They are darker, tangy, and sweet in comparison to other raisins.  They are often added to smoothies and desserts as they… Read More »22 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of Black Raisins

item.title: 8 Major Side Effects of Eating Too Much Aloe Vera
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Aloe Vera is a short-stemmed shrub that is known for its amazing health benefits and is widely popular in traditional Indian and Chinese medicines as well as some modern medicines. These benefits are primarily due to the abundance of essential nutrients like vitamins, minerals, flavonoids, phytonutrients, polyphenols, antioxidants, and other compounds in them.
